Uses of Class
com.github.tadukoo.util.view.paint.gradient.LinearGradient.GradientDirection

Packages that use LinearGradient.GradientDirection
Package Description
com.github.tadukoo.util.view.paint.gradient
Provides builders for making Gradients that can be used to span an arbitrary space (has a method to generate a Paint when given a Dimension, rather than making a gradient paint that only works for certain dimensions.

  • Uses of LinearGradient.GradientDirection in com.github.tadukoo.util.view.paint.gradient
